name: The Last Viking
description:
Take up the story of the last survivor of a great battle between the Vikings and the Old-Dead! Go through 20+ levels and different biomes as you search for the lost relics. 

During this battle there were four sacred relics that got stolen. They are important and without them the dead vikings cannot enter Valhalla. The gods  are angry that they were stolen and wont allow the slain warriors entry until the relics have been returned. 

You are the last hope to bring them back! Please find the stolen relics so your brothers and sisters can enter Valhalla. If you don't, they will be forever stuck in limbo between this world and the next!

Hurry Hero!

The game is done in Java and using OpenGL 2.0 es
Main purpose of the game was to learn more about game dev as well as getting to know how opengl works. In the credit section of the game you will find where most of the art comes from aswell as where the music is from. 

Its my first real game released and i hope you like it. Feel free to give feedback or criticism.  

//Kaarin
